tool_description: Single API to build multi-channel transactional notifications.
name: Engagespot Push Notification
title: Engagespot Push Notification

api_list.name: Send Notification
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://engagespot-push-notification.p.rapidapi.com/notifications"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "engagespot-push-notification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://engagespot-push-notification.p.rapidapi.com/notifications"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
